title: Tawngtai hlawhtlintirtu
lyrics:
Tawngtai hlawhtlintirtu,
Kan dil hi ngaihthla la;
I van malsawm hlu chu,
Vur ang che kan chungah.
I thutiam chungah innghatin,
Kan dil Thlarau rawn leih langin.

Lei nu leh pate hian,
Fa dil an ngaihthla si;
An tan khawngaih vur chuan,
Thil chakkhai an pek hi.
Nang, kan Pa berin thlrau pawh,
I fa engti tak pe che maw!

Kan van Pa chu I ni,
Keini I khawngaih fa;
Tunah I thlarau hi,
Lo lang se, kan zingah.
Mi tinin min pawl hria sela,
I hming mawi lawmin kan fak ang.
